scripts.dev: sh -c "export NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 && export NEXT_TELEMETRY_DEBUG=1" && sh -c "./node_modules/.bin/concurrently "next dev --turbo" "tailwindcss --input input.css --output output.css --watch""
scripts.build: sh -c "export NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 && export NEXT_TELEMETRY_DEBUG=1" && next build
scripts.start: sh -c "export NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 && export NEXT_TELEMETRY_DEBUG=1" && next start
scripts.lint: sh -c "export NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 && export NEXT_TELEMETRY_DEBUG=1" && next lint
scripts.export: sh -c "export NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 && export NEXT_TELEMETRY_DEBUG=1" && next build && next export
